---

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>TakeSnapshot</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/"}></MethodEndpoint>


Call this API to take a screenshot of the **mixed stream**. You can receive a notification with `event_type` of `1` through [Callback](/cloud-recording-server/end-callback) to obtain a JPG format image.

<Note title="Note">Call frequency limit: 10 times/second</Note>

## Request
